resources.string: This app is a Tasker plugin to trigger a vibration pattern on the wearable device only, for a discreet notification tap where a popup is not required.\n\nTo use it create a new Tasker task and add TTW from the plugins. You\'ll be able to change the type of vibration tap within the configuration screen.

Watch companion is not installed. This app will not work properly.

If your watch is running Android Wear 1.x, then you do not have to do anything, app will be installed automatically in few minutes at most.

If your watch is running Android Wear 2, please click 'Open Store' button below to open Play Store on the watch and install companion app.
Play Store Request Failed. Wear device(s) may not support Play Store, that is, the Wear device may be version 1.0.
